Package com.msasc.lib.db.util

Class RandomData

java.lang.Object
com.msasc.lib.db.util.RandomData
public class RandomData extends Object
A generator of random data, mainly records and recordsets, useful for tests.
Author:
Miquel Sas

    • getCode

      public String getCode(RandomData.CodePattern pattern)
      Return a random code.
      Parameters:
      pattern - The code pattern.
      Returns:
      The random code.

    • getCode

      public String getCode(String pattern)
      Returns a random code based on the given pattern. Any character in the mask not included in the valid mask characters is treated literally. Valid mask characters are:
      • # a digit
      • A an upper case alpha numerical digit or letter
      • a a lower case alpha numerical digit or letter
      • ? an alpha numerical digit or letter with random case
      • L an upper case letter
      • l a lower case letter
      • ! a letter with random case
      Parameters:
      pattern - The pattern.
      Returns:
      The random code.

    • getCode

      public String getCode(Field field, int prefixLength)
      Returns a random text.

    • getCode

      public String getCode(String pattern, String letters, String digits)
      Returns a random code based on the given pattern. Any character in the mask not included in the valid mask characters is treated literally. Valid mask characters are:
      • # a digit
      • A an upper case alpha numerical digit or letter
      • a a lower case alpha numerical digit or letter
      • ? an alpha numerical digit or letter with random case
      • L an upper case letter
      • l a lower case letter
      • ! a letter with random case
      Parameters:
      pattern - The pattern.
      letters - Optional letters.
      digits - Optional list of digits.
      Returns:
      The random code.
